quiz-intro: This is a video quiz to help Ultimate players (in other words, refrees -- since it is self refereed) get better at the rules of the sport.  Hope it helps you become better aware of the rules, and in turn makes you a better player!

question.text: An uncontested pick is called in the stack at Stall 5. How does play continue?
answers: Defense catches up; Stall resumes at 5
Defense catches up; Stall goes back to 0
Offense player goes back to their mark; Stall resumes at 5
Offense player goes back to their mark; Stall goes back to 0

question.text: A foul is called by the thrower on their mark. Stall count was at 2. The foul is uncontested. How does play continue?
answers: Disc goes back; Players reset to positions when throw was being made; Stall resumes from 2
Disc goes back; Players reset to positions when throw was being made; Stall restarts at 0
Disc stays with receiver and it is a score
Disc stays with receiver who goes back to the goal line and starts play
